name: Nerai
description: NERAI offers a contemporary twist on sophisticated Greek dining in the heart of the city. We feature a vivacious bar, energetic dining rooms and a beguiling private event space. Flavorful seafood focused dishes and extraordinary drinks are stripped down to their simple essence, and then presented beautifully. Our polished service team pays attention to each individual guest, striving to make their experience outstanding. With two floors of dining, we also offer incredible rooms for your private events. Our attention to detail will provide you with impressed guests
address: 55 E 54th St Between Madison Avenue & Park Avenue, New York City, NY 10022-4206

reviews.title: Excellent Service
reviews.description: The food and service here are excellent. We have eaten here a number of times. Every dish has been excellent, and the service is spectacular.attentive without being annoying. We are part time residents, and this is our favorite NYC restaurant. They have been great during Covid with their heated courtyard. This past weekend we called Nerai to send a gift certificate to a friend. Michael, the manager, personally dropped the gift card at her apartment building.above and beyond the call of duty

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.description: Apparently, you can have good Mediterranean food in the middle of winter.in New York. Nice dishes with great outdoor seating

reviews.title: Not sure what’s the hype about
reviews.description: Not sure what’s the hype about this restaurant. Aside from being ultra pretentious, the food was average. Took a client there for dinner, he wanted good Greek food, boy was it underwhelming

reviews.title: Never showed up
reviews.description: We ended up canceling the order after 1 hour and 20min. I ordered $160 but I got only $25 credit. I never had any experience like this and it was unappropriated attitude to try contact with the restaurant. Thankfully, I skipped my dinner

reviews.title: Delicious Dinner
reviews.description: We had a wonderful dinner at Nerai. These folks have gotten access to the space next door to them. There are a number (20) of tables, spaced far apart in a beautiful spot. The food (zuchini chips looked good, but we will try next time) was excellent.I had the autumn risotto and my wife had the spaghetti and shrimp. The Greek Salad was awesome. The martini was terrific!!! Great location. Great atmosphere. Perfect for covid. Service was excellent!!!! Prices were fair. It is not cheap, but it is reasonable for mid town Manhattan

reviews.title: AMAZING STAFF AND FOOD
reviews.description: I wanted to thank the staff!!! It is hard to find individuals that have manners and amazing. food!!!! I had champagne and a greek salad. I am looking forward to going back! You all are really really lovely

reviews.title: Beautiful moment
reviews.description: Dear Nerai team, Thank you for all the dinners in your place. Your food is simply excellent and tasty. We definitly feel in a good atmosphere when entering in the restaurant. Amability of the team, beautiful place in the 54th Street. Hope to come back soon to enjoy another Octopus house specialitie ❤️ Thank you

reviews.title: Wonderful Food and Service
reviews.description: The intention was to have a good meal, at the end we had a very nice meal plus excellent Greek wine and wonderful services, super recomended

reviews.title: Excellent Food and Service
reviews.description: The food was great and the service excellent. Drinks also highly recommended. I will definitely be back at Nerai and I will recommend to family and friends

reviews.title: ‘Superb’ 10 out of 10
reviews.description: We visited Nerai on our first evening in New York and it was truly superb from start to finish. Great service, we had a good corner table. My partner had the octopus which was cooked to perfection and I had the Greek salad which was divine and felt could have been in the Greek Islands! The wine was delicious and have to say was our best meal in New York. Would highly recommend and definitely revisit next time in New York
